summary: Customer feedback from Linda Thompson regarding the need for a Gantt chart view in the project management platform, including specific feature requests and urgency.
questions: What are the key features requested by customers?
How urgent is the implementation of a Gantt chart view?
Who would be interested in this new feature?
title: Customer Feedback - Gantt Chart Feature Request
text: We've been using your project management platform for 8 months now with our team of 45 people. Overall, we're very happy with the product! However, we desperately need a Gantt chart view for our projects. Most of our work involves dependencies between tasks, and the current Kanban view doesn't show these relationships clearly. We're currently using a separate tool just for timeline visualization, which creates extra work and potential sync issues. **Would be great if the feature included:** - Drag-and-drop timeline editing - Dependency arrows between tasks - Resource allocation view - Export to PDF We know several other teams in our company (200+ employees total) who would switch to your platform if this feature existed. **Urgency:** High - considering alternatives if not available in next 6 months **Additional Context:** Happy to beta test if you develop this feature!
claims: We've been using your project management platform for 8 months now with our team of 45 people.

We desperately need a Gantt chart view for our projects.
Most of our work involves dependencies between tasks, and the current Kanban view doesn't show these relationships clearly.
We know several other teams in our company (200+ employees total) who would switch to your platform if this feature existed.
